ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy armor research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research in the field of energy armor will allow you to create a new type of protection, if, of course, you have an energy source capable of supplying it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic energy storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Energy armor is demanding on energy sources. We cannot carry a large power station with us, so we need a compact source of energy. It opens up the possibility of building the simplest source of energy - the battery pack.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced energy sources
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the help of unique finds, we can make energy sources several times superior to ours. It opens up the possibility of create improved battery pack.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy grid batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: The use of energy gratings increased capacity even further. It opens up the possibility of create energy grid batteries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanotechnology batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: The use of nanotechnology in the creation of batteries allows you to create an energy source that surpasses any previous one. It opens up the possibility of create Silicon nanowire batteries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Armor Improvement
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can improve the armor by adding its modules, which can improve its parameters. Allows you to create tools to improve armor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotic station
ResearchProjectDef.description: Assistant robots will provide additional accuracy with armor, which will allow you to install better modules. Allows you to create robotic manipulators for installing level 2 modules.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanorobots
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now we can use nanorobots to improve armor. This will allow you to change previously inaccessible places of reservation. Allows you to create nanorobots to install level 3 improvements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Energy Management Techniques
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can optimize energy consumption by redirecting stored energy to another location. Allows you to create capacitor banks and transformers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy optimization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using advanced materials, we can create optimal batteries to store more energy and optimize energy consumption for faster charging of armor. Allows you to create a nano-yolk and an energy cell.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy accelerator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Having assembled a special energy accelerator, we can use the entire energy potential of the station. Opens the opportunity to create an energy amplifier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic respiratory protection
ResearchProjectDef.description: The installation of special filters allows you to protect yourself from simple toxic gases and effects. Allows you to create a basic filtration system.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Protective material
ResearchProjectDef.description: For physical protection from the effects of weather and human activities, we need material that can protect against bad weather and radiation. Allows you to create antitoxic seals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple guidance system
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating a simple guidance system will increase accuracy. Allows you to create a guidance system.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stimulants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Stimulants will allow the carrier to inject adrenaline, so that his combat skills will be better. Allows you to create stimulants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light protection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating material that can be placed under the armor to improve protection. Allows the creation of reinforced armor cloth.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy protection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating plates that can be installed in the upper layers of the armor to further increase protection. Allows you to create reinforced plates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved mobility
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating and installing shock absorbers in the lower part of the armor will allow the wearer to move more conveniently. Allows you to create shock absorbers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple medical systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: The creation of a basic medical system will allow monitoring the health indicators of a carrier and taking actions to provide medical care. Allows you to create a first aid interface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Protein therapy of antigenesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Thanks to the automatic protein therapy system, we can increase the survivability of the carrier and its combat parameters. Allows you to create protein therapy of antigenesis.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Adrenaline injectors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating adrenaline injectors will significantly strengthen the carrier, and thanks to a special injection system, you can arrange an overdose to get a super fighter. Allows you to create adrenaline injectors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Active armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating armor that adapts to each shot will significantly enhance the armor. Allows you to create active plates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Circular echolocation
ResearchProjectDef.description: A special eco-locator will allow you to control the space around the carrier, which will increase the maneuverability of the fighter. Allows you to create a echo system 'Plato'

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Filtration Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating a new generation of filters will protect the wearer of the armor from all possible problems associated with air.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Joint improvement
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating motorized joints can greatly facilitate movement in a suit and increase speed. Allows you to create motorized joints.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Upper layer armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Creating detachable upon impact of armor will protect the wearer of armor for a limited number of hits. Allows you to create ablation coating.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy shield system
ResearchProjectDef.description: The shield system will create a powerful energy field around the carrier to protect against damage. Allows you to create a shield modulator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Kinetic buffer
ResearchProjectDef.description: The buffer will allow you to accumulate kinetic energy from physical impacts and hits and release it back in large quantities by a signal from the armor carrier. Allows you to create a kinetic buffer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced security systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: An advanced protection system will allow you to redistribute energy in the armor and transfer it to the place of impact. Allows you to create a protective interface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combat exoskeleton
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combat exoskeleton includes a large system to enhance the physical abilities of an armor carrier. Allows you to create a combat exoskeleton.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical exoskeleton
ResearchProjectDef.description: A medical exoskeleton will allow you to monitor vital signs at the internal level and instantly respond to any threats to life. Allows you to create a medical exoskeleton.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Energy boots
ResearchProjectDef.description: Shoes with built-in energy amplifiers will achieve maximum comfort and speed. Allows you to create energy boots.
